Definition_of_the_Variable: The numeric Federal Information Processing Standards (FIPS) identifier for the state/area.
Year of the tracked statistics for the state/area.
Month of the tracked statistics for the state/area.

Variable_Name: Total Civilian Non-Institutional Population in State/Area
Definition_of_the_Variable: Total number of non-institutionalized civilians residing in the state/area.

Variable_Name: Total Civilian Labor Force in State/Area
Definition_of_the_Variable: Total number of civilians eligible for employment that reside in the state/area.
Percent of civilians eligible for employment out of the total non-institutionalized civilian population.
Total number of civilians currently employed in the state/area.

Variable_Name: Percent (%) of Labor Force Employed in State/Area
Definition_of_the_Variable: Percent of currently employed civilians out of the total non-institutionalized civilian population.
Total number of civilians currently unemployed in the state/area.

Variable_Name: Percent (%) of Labor Force Unemployed in State/Area
Definition_of_the_Variable: Percent of currently unemployed civilians out of the total non-institutionalized civilian population.
